commandDescription: Merges permission sets and writes to stdout
permsetFlagDescription: list of permission set files to merge (or names when using -g or -d); list is comma separated
formatasprofileFlagDescription: format output as profile metadata (default is permission set)
getorgFlagDescription: look for permission sets on Salesforce org
getpermsdirFlagDescription: look for permission sets in the sfdx project permissions folder
logMergeActionConvert: *** merge: converting profile to permission set prior to merge
errorPermSetDoesNotExist: Permission set not found on Org '%s'.
errorPermSetFileDoesNotExist: Permission set not found in SFDX project permissions folder '%s'.
errorInvalidXMLFormat: Invalid XML format. Not valid Salesforce permission set metadata '%s'.
